bibl.title: The Wheel, the Whip and Other Implements of Torture: Erotic Magic in Pindar Pythian 4.213-19.
bibl.note: Points out the affinities between Pindar's description of the magical device and the similar aims of later magical spells preserved in the Greek magical papyri and defixiones.
